painPoints.description: The landing page of the website is visually unappealing and lacks effective calls to action.
supportingQuotes: this homepage here just needs a lot of work.
it needs to be visually more pleasing, a better call to action.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: Users may navigate but are likely discouraged by the poor design.
painPoints.impact: Users might leave the site without joining due to lack of visual appeal and clear direction.

painPoints.description: Inconsistent membership numbers are presented on different pages, causing confusion.
supportingQuotes: On some pages, we say we have 700 members. On some pages, we say we have 750 members.
we actually don't. We got 680 members.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: Users may attempt to find accurate information on their own but likely remain confused.
painPoints.impact: This undermines trust and credibility, which could deter potential members.

painPoints.description: The navigation structure is confusing, making it difficult to find relevant information.
supportingQuotes: I’ve got to click into a lot of different things to get information.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: Users may rely on trial and error to locate information.
painPoints.impact: Frustration with navigation could lead to users abandoning the site.

painPoints.description: The Join Us button is not effectively placed for visibility.
supportingQuotes: I kind of forgot that thing was even at the top.
we should actually put that Join Us button at the bottom after people read about us.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: Users might eventually find the button, but it requires extra effort.
painPoints.impact: Reduced likelihood of new member sign-ups.

painPoints.description: The FAQs and Learn More sections contain mixed messages that could confuse prospective members.
supportingQuotes: we shouldn't be asking them if they've joined recently.
we need to update these committees with what actually is going on.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: Users may look elsewhere for information or reach out to existing members.
painPoints.impact: Inconsistent information can lead to misinformed decisions about joining.

painPoints.description: Waitlisted events are not correctly displayed on the mobile app.
supportingQuotes: I don't see where any of the waitlisted events are actually showing up right now in the mobile app.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: Users might check the web app for accurate information.
painPoints.impact: Missed opportunities for event registrations could frustrate users.
